ref: 3173 kirāṭa m. ʻ merchant ʼ Rājat., kirīṭa -- 2 m. BhP., kírāta- m. ʻ a degraded mountain tribe ʼ VS., cilātī -- f. ʻ woman of this tribe ʼ YogH. [Alternance of k -- and c -- , -- ṭ -- and -- t<-> suggests Drav. origin, EWA i 211. Perh. same as kilāta -- ʻ dwarf ʼ]

Pk. kirāḍa -- , ˚āya -- , cilāa -- m., f. ˚āī -- , ˚āiyā -- ʻ a non -- Aryan tribe, slave ʼ, cilāī -- f.;
